## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT5G13300](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT5G13300)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>AGD3, FKD2, FKD2, SFC, VAN3</u>
- **Gene Name:** ARF-GAP DOMAIN3, FORKED 2, SCARFACE, ASCULAR NETWORK DEFECTIVE 3
- **Description:**   ARF GTPase-activating protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2183916
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [van3-1]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Abnormal pattern of leaf veneation. Veins are discontinous in cotyledons although the overall architeture of venation is not affected.
